aboutpara: Iâ€™m a motivated Mechatronics and Robotics Engineering student at Queenâ€™s University, passionate about artificial intelligence, autonomous vehicles and robotics. Ultimately, I aspire to leverage these technologies to build a safer, more sustainable worldâ€”Iâ€™m impact-driven, value feedback, and love to learn.

I find myself deeply interested in robotics in unpredictable outdoor environments. In the summer of 2023, I had the opportunity to conduct a research project on autonomous perception and navigation in uncrewed surface vehicles (USVs) at Ingenuity Labs using the Maritime Robotics AS Otter USV. This experience ignited my interest in autonomous vehicles and ocean robotics, leading me to found Queen's University's Autonomous Surface Vessel Design Team, aQuatonomous.Iâ€™ve most recently applied my passion for autonomous robotics on NVIDIAâ€™s Autonomous Vehicles Planning and Control team, and now as part of the Planning and Control team at Provectus Robotics Solutions.
